Class BookingSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • BookingSystem
  • public class BookingSystem
extends Object
    BookingSystem is the main section of the BookingApp, managing the Bookings and attributes associated with them
    Version:
    24/02/2021
    Author:
    Jenni Schofield

    • Field Summary

      (package private) Scanner reader

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addAssistant()
      Adds an AssistantOnShift to the system, given user input
      void addBookableRoom()
      Adds a BookableRoom to the list and to the respective Room's list of BookableRooms
      void addBooking()
      Adds new Booking to the system based upon user input
      static void clearConsole()
      Clears the console for between screens
      void concludeBooking()
      Concludes a booking, chosen by the user, by setting the status of the booking to COMPLETED
      Booking createBooking​(String time, String email)
      Creates a booking by finding a free room and free assistant
      ArrayList<String> getTimeSlots()
      Gets the list of all valid timeslots with no duplicates
      void initialiseData()
      Initialises data for the system to test, with 3 Assistants, 3 Rooms, 9 BookableRooms, 9 AssistantOnShift, and 6 Bookings
      boolean isAlreadyScheduled​(AssistantOnShift a)
      Checks to see if an assistant is already scheduled for the timeslot
      boolean isDate​(String date)
      Checks to see if a String fits into the format dd/mm/yyyy

      Checks to see if a String fits into the format dd/mm/yyyy HH:MM

      Checks to see if a BookableRoom already exists in the list
      boolean isNumeric​(String num)
      Checks to see if a String is numerical or not
      void listAssistant()
      Lists all AssistantsOnShift in the system
      void listBookableRooms()
      Lists all the Bookable Rooms in the Booking System
      void listBooking()
      Lists all the Bookings registered in the system, with no duplicates
      void mainMenu()
      Main menu options for the Booking System.
      void printMainMenu()
      Prints the main menu screen
      void removeAssistant()
      Removes AssistantOnShift from the system and the assistant it's assigned to, by getting user choice
      void removeBookableRoom()
      Displays all removable BookableRooms, then takes the user input and removes that room
      void removeBooking()
      Removes booking from system based upon user input

      Removes an AssistantOnShift from the system and its respective Assistant
      void removingRoom​(BookableRoom b)
      Removes a BookableRoom from the list and from the Room it's assigned to
